update.foreach: UPDATE peoplewarefee SET MONTH4 = #{item.month4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},MONTH5 = #{item.month5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},MONTH6 = #{item.month6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},MONTH7 = #{item.month7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH8 = #{item.month8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},MONTH9 = #{item.month9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},MONTH10 = #{item.month10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},MONTH11 = #{item.month11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH12 = #{item.month12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},MONTH1 = #{item.month1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},MONTH2 = #{item.month2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},MONTH3 = #{item.month3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{item.status},CREATEBY = #{item.createby},CREATEON = #{item.createon},MODIFYBY = #{item.modifyby},MODIFYON = #{item.modifyon}, OWNER = #{item.owner},TENANTID = #{item.tenantid} WHERE GROUP_ID = #{item.groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and YEAR = #{item.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RANKS = #{item.ranks,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
